name: Water Maze
description:
This is a maze called water maze it is controlled by either AWSD or the arrow keys

To win the game the player must collect all pink cubes/pickups 

The Red Sphere indicates the player

The pink Cubes indicate the points

The grey walls and grey cylinders are the obstacles

The yellow short cylinder indicates that the player will be transformed randomly on the playing field

The Black pill indicates that the player will slow down

The green plane indicates that the player will speed up.
